welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rochdale, a charming town known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our historic landmarks, vibrant markets, and scenic countryside, and make the most of your visit. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving mainly long-haul and leisure flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth during peak hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
